title: best hotel
text: 정말좋은호텔중의 하나.룸컨디션부터 직원들태도까지 어느하나부족하지않게 좋았습니다. 같이 여행간 엄마도 매우 만족하셨고 또 다시 가고싶은 호텔입니다. 루프탑수영장도 좋았습니다.

title: 台北獨自自由行～
text: 一句話很好。

title: 좋아요
text: 여러가지로 볼때 가격이 조금 높은 곳이라 생각됩니다. 교통은 나쁘진 않지만 관광객이 hotspot이라 생각할 곳에 위치하고 있지는 않아 위치의 장점은 없습니다. 부대시설과 위생상태는 좋으나 가격을 생각할때 우수하다고 생각되진 않습니다. 직원분들의 서비스가 가장 만족스러웠습니다.

title: 고급호텔을 원하시면 추천
text: 사람들이 많이가는 타이베이역이나 시먼역은 좀 멀리있으나101타워가 근방에 있고 직원들의 친절한 서비스는 정말 대접받는 느낌이었음컨시어지 서비스도 만족

title: 만족한서비스
text: 위치는 조금 아숩지만 그밖에 다른점에서는 최고였습니다.

title: เดินทางสะดวก ห้องเหมาะสมราคา
text: ห้องพักกว้าง ราคาไม่สูง อาหารเช้าบริการดี เดินทางสะดวก

title: ทำเลดี เดินทางสะดวก
text: การบริการดี เดินทางสะดวก  ราคาเหมาะสม

title: Geweldig Superdeluxe Hotel
text: Dit hotel is zeer gunstig gelegen, vlakbij een hele leuke night market en ook niet ver van de gezellige 101 Tower buurt.Als je dit hotel boekt neem dan de Horizon optie, dat biedt vele voordelen zoals gratis ontbijt, gratis drankjes, inclusief mooie wijnen en cocktails van 17.30 tot 19.30. Ook zit hierbij een late check out tot 16.00Het personeel is zeer vriendelijk, en op de 43e verdieping bevindt zich een verwarmd zwembad met geweldig uitzicht.Ik zal hier volgende keer zeker weer verblijven!

title: מלון מעולה מקסים
text: שמחנו מאוד להתארח במלון זה. מלון מצויין, הכי טוב שהיינו בחיים. מעולה. ממש טוב.

title: 部屋の掃除が遅れた為、すぐ部屋に入れなかった。
text: 家族旅行で、部屋２つを頼んたのに、先に一間だけ入りました。これが 団体さん  なりや

title: 事前情報が乏しい
text: チェックイン15:00予約で16:00にフロントで手続きをしようとしたら　１時間以上部屋の準備に時間がかかりガッカリしました。101の花火を見る為に予約したのに屋上のﾊﾟｰﾃｨｰには小さなお子様は入場できないと言われた。事前に分かっていれば予約はしませんでした。

title: サプライズケーキが最高！
text: 彼女の誕生日を祝うため、内緒で部屋にサプライズケーキを準備してもらいました。とても素晴らしいケーキをいただき、彼女も大喜びでした。味も逸品です。さらに部屋まで35Fにアップグレードしていただき、最高の誕生日になりました。また泊まりに行きたいです。ありがとうございました。

title: プール
text: プールはロケーションは最高でしたが、BARがなく、酒を注文しても３０分以上かかるところが不便でした。

title: 良いですが少し古く感じました
text: ウォシュレットが付いてなかったのが日本人にとっては残念でした。

title: 豪華でしたが・・
text: 豪華でしたが、コスパは微妙でした。

title: フロントの対応は悪い
すばらしいホスピタリティでした
text: スタッフがとても親切で、できる限りのサービスをしようという気持ちが伝わり本当に気持ちよく過ごすことができました。また、お部屋もとても広く、清潔で快適に過ごすことができました。レストランは上海パビリオンを最終日に行ったのですが、お料理がとても美味しかったです。一点苦言を言いますと、最後の上海パビリオンで恐らく社員の方と他にジュニア(もしかすると大学生アルバイトではないかと想像するのですが・・・)にサービスいただいたのですが、社員の方は一生懸命指導しながら、私たちにフォローをしてくれているのですが、ジュニアな子たちの対応が素人で、うちの主人は期待値を裏切られた気分になったようです。こちらも予約もしないで、突然入ったので、しょうがないと思うのですが・・・紹興酒の暖めで、沸騰させてしまったのではないかと感じました。ポットに吹きこぼれの後が見受けられ、アルコールが飛んでいたように思います。確かではないのですが、、、それから、紹興酒をついでくれたときに、こぼれてしまったのですが、テーブルを拭かずにそのままだったのも素人ではないかと見受けたところです。不満はそのくらいです。また利用しようと思っています。

title: 全てに快適
text: 間違いによるダブルベッドのツインへの交換、隣室の友人達とのアネックスルームの解放など、テキパキとしてもらいました。静謐とゴージャスが兼ね揃っていると思いました。

title: 全てに満足
text: ほとんど寝るだけの時間しかなかったが、ゆったりとした部屋の感じはとても良かったです。

title: 서비스 객실 모두 최고였습니다
text: 샹그릴라호텔을 자주 이용하지만 타이페이에 샹그릴라 파 이스턴 프라자호텔은 제가 이용한 곳 중 최고의 서비스로 최고의 만족을 준 호텔이었습니다객실도 께끗하고 직원들도 모두 친절해서 2박 내내 불편함 없이 이용했습니다한국인 직원이 있어서 체크인때 도움도 많이 받았습니다시먼이나 101타워를 갈때도 셔틀버스가 시간대별로 잘 되어 있어서 편하게 이동했습니다

title: 겨울에도 야외수영장을 즐길 수 있어요
text: 물이 깊어 어린아이가 수영하기엔 적합하지않아요튜브를 사용할 수 있는지는 물어보지 않았어요저흰 자쿠지에서만 놀았는데도 아이들이 그토록 기다리던 수영놀이를 원없이 할 수 있어서 좋았어요 클럽라운지 서비스도 좋았어요 역시나 101전망이 예뻤답니다

title: 괜찮아요..
text: 가격이 문제죠... 그리고 시내 셔틀버스가 너무 잘되어 있어요..꼭 이용하세요~

title: 호텔 직원들에 감사..
text: 호텔 청결함과 직원들의 친절함에 편안하게 휴식할수 있어 감사드리고싶습니다.

title: 很好
text: 위치는 다소 외졌지만 주위 택시, 우버가 잘 되어 있어 큰 불편은 없었습니다.직원들이 친절은 했지만 손님이 몰리거나 상황이 발생했을 때 다소 우왕좌왕 하는 부분이 있었습니다. 그럼에도 전체적으로 깔끔하고 샹그릴라 특유의 인테리어가 만족스러웠습니다.

title: 호라이즌디럭스. 편안한 휴식. 101전망
text: 호라이즌클럽에서 하루종일 차와 간식을 먹으며 객실에서 뒹굴며 지냈어요. 아무래도 높은층이라 엘리베이터 올라오는중에 귀가멍해지기도 합니다. 관광다닐꺼 다 다니고 3일간 여기서 쉬다가 귀국하려고 잡은일정. 위치안좋다고 하는데 옆에 백화점있고 마사지샵이나 이자카야정도는 있어요. 직원들 모두 잘 훈련되어 친절하고 다른곳과 달리 영어가잘통하는 편. 전망이뻥뚫려 있어서 객실에서 게우름부리다가기 좋아요. 다만 베란다도없고 외부와 차단된 고층빌딩특성상 공기가 갑갑할수있고 저는 하루지나고부터는 계속추웠어요. 루프탑풀장도 작지만 쓸모있는분위기이고 유리없이 맨눈으로 넓은 타이베이전망을 보기에 안성맞춤. Qi마사지도 가격은 한국호텔의마사지샵수준으로 고가이지만 즐겨볼만한수준.
room_type: 豪華特大雙人床或雙床房

title: Simply a lovely place to stay
text: It is becoming my favorite place to stay whenever I am in town. The staff performance was second to none.

title: 聖誕旅行
text: 非常好，服務周到

title: Great service
text: Excellent service. This is becoming my place to stay whenever I am in town.

title: Great location
text: Great place to stay in Taipei. Can't say enough about it's excellent staff service.
room_type: 高級特大雙人床或雙床房

title: Comfortable & nice hotel
text: This is the 2nd time i go back to this hotel in 1 month. Location is good to me not in the heart of the city but nearby that is nice to me. staff are very friendly & welcoming. Will be back to this hotel when i go back to taiwan.

title: Hmmmm.... Good , Ok... But no washlet on toilet (
text: I upgrade to an executive room.I thought that it's Well complete and comfortable if I upgrade to an executive room. The room was big, clean but only on there toilet that have no washlet or bide wash. I request a small bowl or tabo in Tagalog. They gave Me a hahaha 😁sandok. Later, they gave me a small bowl or tabo.  Well ,,, it's Ok. But I suggest to install a washlet or bide wash to the executive room.  Because ... That is one point important for the Guest. The staff of the hotel are attentive and friendly. The pool... Ok. Very good. The food also... Ok. Delicious. Only the staff of the restaurant are not attentive or not active.  They not told us the buffet breakfast must be closed in a few mins. And I invite my brother in law to eat together a breakfast in this hotel. I'm so ashamed because I told to my brother in law it's a buffet ... We go there 9:15 am.

title: Great Location.
text: Great location based on where I needed to be in the city. The staff performance was wonderful. The only negative I could think of was probably the food selection at the Cafe on 36th floor. It was fairly limited. Obviously, you were there for the view of the city.

title: 5 Nights in Taipei
text: We stayed 5 nights at the Shangri-La in the Da'an neighbourhood in Taipei. The hotel upgraded us to a large room with an amazing view of Taipei 101. The Da'an neighbourhood is a great location with easy access to all the major sights.

title: 호라이즌클럽 꼭 이용하세요
text: 위치 말고는 다 완벽했습니다 비싼 값하는 호텔!

text: 絕對有五星級酒店的風範！偶爾試一下也無防

title: Great place to stay
text: One of the best in the city!

title: Well keep old hotel
text: this is not a new hotel but it had been well keep. room is big but not enough light @ some parts. this hotel also have to good spa that we can waste some time dinner in the hotel was not bad better then other. hight tea is over rated only have a ok view as we can't see taipei 101 as its raining when i was there. overall this is good stay for me will be back again

title: Good old hotel that is well keep
text: this is not a new hotel but it had been well keep. room is big but not enough light @ some parts. this hotel also have to good spa that we can waste some time dinner in the hotel was not bad better then other. hight tea is over rated only have a ok view as we can't see taipei 101 as its raining when i was there. overall this is good stay for me will be back again

title: worth every star!
text: I can't say anything negative about this hotel. the staff was great, service was excellent. the rooms are all well looked after. will definitely stay there again.

title: worth every star!
text: I can't say anything negative about this hotel. the staff was great, service was excellent. the rooms are all well looked after. will definitely stay there again.

title: Utterly Brilliant
text: Amazing, the staff are wonderfully friendly and nice, everything about my stay was perfect! Fantastically accomodating! Beautiful, beautiful place. Loved it.

title: プラザスイート最高 !!!
text: 両親との旅行でプラザスイートを利用しました。お部屋には２つトイレがあり家族で利用するのに便利です。朝食はバラエティーに富んでいて素晴らしく、ホライズンラウンジの食事も外食しなくて良いくらいの内容です。日本食Ibuki レストランの鉄板焼が最高でした。1Fのフロントスタッフのレベルが高いです。とてもテキパキとした対応で助かりました。今回は4連泊でシャングリラのホテルライフを存分に楽しみました。また利用します！
room_type: 雅仕套房－可使用豪華閣貴賓廊

title: 호라이즌 스위트
text: 룸 업그레이드해서 스위트룸에 머물렀습니다. 다음 방문시에도 샹그릴라에서 머무르고싶습니다.

text: 수영장이 정말좋았고 수영장에서 바라보는 전망도 정말 굿입니다. 객실 내에서 자그만 벌레 출현.... 그것만 빼면 위치며 뭐며 대만족입니다.

title: Nice Location and Friendly Staff
text: Nice Location and Friendly Staff
response_body:
Dear Valued Guest, 

We thank you very much for the pleasant feedback and comments received and are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. 

On behalf of all our teams and colleagues, we sincerely look forward to welcoming you back to your "home away from home" when in Taipei. We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon.

Sincerely yours,

Randy F. Zupanski
General Manager

title: pleasant stay
text: Very convenient and quiet hotel.Also loved the clean and good service. Great view plus the foot spa across the hotel was GREAT!
response_body:
Dear Valued Guest, 

We thank you very much for the feedback and comments received online which can assist us maintaining and improving the service standards at all times. We do hope that we can welcome you back very soon. 

Sincerely yours,

Randy F. Zupanski
General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
text: This is one of the best Hotel In the world and please choose it

title: Excellent Hotel
text: This is one of the best hotel in the world

title: 超棒
text: Not too bad. Service are good

title: 超棒
text: Check in staff is very friendly n kind. She knew that I was not feeling well due to the long car ride, she arranged to send hot honey water to my room.  Very considerate n nice. Nice roof top swimming pool with responsible n friendly life guards.
room_type: 豪華特大雙人床或雙床房

title: Excelente hotel. Nice hotel
text: Great place. Very good service

title: 超棒
text: The staff are excellent in providing friendly,  professional advises  and helps for the needs of travelers. During my stay of 8 days, they have never failed to satisfy  my request in an earnest way

title: One of my favorites
text: Simply love this place. Can't go wrong staying there!

title: Amazing hotel
text: The staff was amazing. Especially the front desk staff. I think her name was Tiffany, but she was super lovely and gave me a lot of good information. I liked all the attention to detail. Like the fact that they had the same smell in the lobby as in their shampoo and body wash. And they used my name every time I called the front desk.

title: Good
text: Nice

title: Family trip in Taipei
text: Sangria-la hotel was really good all round and the customer service made it so much better because their willing to help and broaden our opportunities made Taipei a lot more enjoyable and affordable. It was a great stay and we would love to come back.

title: Needs to update their facilities
text: We stayed at an executive room @ the 15th flr and the toilet is not smart toilet. clogged shower area. so many partitions. bed is comforable, staff is not updated among themselves. surprised to say that we have stayed better @ victoria hotel (near miramar) and paid way much lower price.

title: So so
text: ok

title: 素晴らしい景観＆良いスタッフ
text: 今回は妻の誕生日も兼ねて初めての滞在させて頂きました。事前に101ビューの部屋をお願いしてましたが、メールでマネージャーさんからケーキを用意していただいたりとても良くしてくれました。特別な日ということもありオススメのホテル以外のお店を教えて頂いたりとても素晴らしいステイでした。

title: 便利
text: 観光：繁華街に近く、夜市、台北101を楽しむことができアクセスが便利でした。空港アクセス：空港からのバスを利用すればスーツケースがあっても問題なくチェックインできました。ホテル：お部屋は清潔で広く快適でした。プールは時期的に子供達が多く賑やかな様子でした。また落ち着いている時にプールもゆっくり楽しみたいです。

title: 皆さん親切でした
text: ホテルで働いている皆さんがホントに親切で助かりましたし、楽しめました。ただ、駅から10分弱歩くのでﾁｶｹﾚﾊﾞなお◎です。でも、本当に楽しかったです。

title: さすが
text: また、泊まりたい。
response_body:
お客様へ、
シャングリ ラ ファーイースタンプラザホテル 台北をお選びくださいまして誠に有難うございます。また貴重な御意見をお寄せくださいまして重ねて御礼申し上げます。頂戴したご意見は担当部署に申し伝え、サービス向上・改善に努めてまいります。

また台北にお越しになる機会がございましたら、是非お迎えさせていただきたいと存じます。今後ともどうぞ宜しくお願い申し上げます。

title: Great hotel
text: Good staff and great location

title: very good
text: very good

title: Good hotel for the brand
text: Service  is very good, room upgraded to three beds, very clean and staff is helpful. Location is quite near 101, need to take taxi for general needs

title: Good environment & services
text: New equipment & facilities in roomRoom is big enough

title: A good hotel
text: We stayed there for almost a week. My 4 year old enjoyed the swimming pool & breakfast. It is within walking distance to local night market & some supermarket as well. 10 mins walking to the nearest MRT station. But unfortunately, my husband has a dust allergic when we stayed there. We can see the dust flying all over the room (I do not know it is because of the fabric they use for their bedcover or the room is just not very clean). Hopefully, they can look into this.

title: Still one of the best in Taipei after all these years
text: Despite new five star international hotels springing up in Taipei in recent years after many years of zero development, Shangri-La in Taipei is still one of the best.  Central, good location yet not too noisy and busy.Great service.  The Chinese restaurant made room for us in another restaurant to have Chinese food eventhough theirs was full.

title: Good impression in genera
text: Quiet & comfortable stay

title: 超棒
text: Handy location and friendly staff. Horizon Club provided excellent and efficient services for customers traveling for business.

title: Fantastic hotel
text: This hotel has a fantastic roof top swimming pool on 41floor. you can watch taipei 101 building at top side and enjoy great time with your family or friends. Employees of this hotel are very good English speaker and you can communicate with them. This hotel is located in main area of Taipei city. so you can reach easily many attractive places. If you are lucky, you are able to watch taipei 101 building in your room even though there is foggy day.

title: Truly lives up to expectations
text: Except for its being a little far from a MRT station, Shangri-La Eastern Plaza hotel offers a true Shangri-la for travellers: spacious and luxurious room with quality amenities, professional and efficient yet warm and friendly staff as well as beautiful lounge on the 38th floor.

title: more than what expected
text: ive stayed in a lot of five star hotels. but i think shangrila fareastern is the best so far. even if compared to other shangrila brand hotels. this is more than what ive expected

title: Fantastic
text: Everything was perfect! I would definitely return.

title: Good view, warm services and good room arrangement
text: Good view, warm services and good room arrangement

title: Nice rooms. Well laid out and spacious.
text: Staff were good and helpful, easy to get cabs. Coffee shop closes at 8pm turn into a bar. Nice cafes nearby for breakfast serving good pastries and coffee. Not near anything of interest but cabs easily available.

title: One of the top class Shangrila's properties
fantastoc stay at shangri-la  taipei
text: awesome.  food was great, service?- they new my family by name on the 2nd day!  Shangrila lives up to its word on premier service.  rooms were so clean and so quiet you could hear a pin drop.

title: Good staff, clean. Very close to mall
Lovely swimming pool
text: Stayed 2nights. quite far from tube stations near the hotel, probably takes 20mins on foot. Very friendly and kind staff and reception. Whats more, safety gurards at swimming pool is also so helpful. Would love to visit here again

text: Hotel needs upgrade. Amenities not up to Shangrila standard. Just not as nice as when it was 10 years ago.

title: Quite well-satisfied service, comparatively good price.
text: I like every thing about this hotel. I like most its bath room. My room was upgraded and the bathroom was big and has breath-taking the view of the center of Taipei. Room was cleaned twice a day.

title: Great location
text: It's at the nicer part of taipei, where is modern and clean. Its within walking distance to shopping anf taxi to most destination is at reasonable price.

title: It's the Shangri-la, what do you expect
text: The hotel overall was great. But there were some points I hope they would consider. The fragrance they spray in the lobby is extremely overpowering. It's like being punched in the face with incense every time you walk through the entrance. I had to hold my breath every time I walked in.

title: I was a victim of "upsell" my stay was over my budget.
text: Service very good, Monica in Horizon Club took an extra interest in our visit and was very helpful.

title: STAFF IS SUPERB!
text: I would like to praise the staff by the name of Louis. I was well greeted at the front desk upon my arrival, it was my birthday and he arranged a surprise cake in my room. I was overwhelmed and greatly appreciate of the service and effort! I'll definitely visit again!!

title: Great rooftop pool
text: Good location and great rooftop pool for this extreme heat at this time of the year.

title: Staff  phoned me around 2:45 pm daily for 6 days .
text: I put on Do Not Disturb sign until I left my room daily around 4:00pm . Staff called me daily at 2:45pm to ask me whether I need a room-make-up or not . This is very disturbing and unnecessary.

title: excellence
text: very comfy and nice services and staff

title: Outstanding experience
text: My stay was a pleasant experience, from the checkin to the checkout. It is a 5 star service

title: Another great stay
text: Simply love this place! The performance of the staff was simply amazing. Will continue to stay here whenever I am in town.

title: Excellent place to stay
text: It simply was wonderful. I just can't say enough about it's excellent staff performance.
